original_text: Then all the men who knew that their wives had made offerings to other gods, and all the women who stood by, a great assembly, all the people who lived in Pathros in the land of Egypt, answered Jeremiah:
korean_text: 그리하여 자기 아내들이 다른 신들에게 분향하는 줄을 아는 모든 남자와 곁에 섰던 모든 여인 곧 애굽 땅 바드로스에 사는 모든 백성의 큰 무리가 예레미야에게 대답하여 이르되

sentences.original_text: Then all the men who knew
that their wives had made offerings
and all the women who stood by
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 곁에 서 있던 모든 여자들도

sentences.original_text: all the people who lived in Pathros
